#summary What is ZideStore

[ZideStore] is a component of the [OpenGroupware] groupware server.  [ZideStore] provides an integration oriented middleware solution allowing clients using multiple protocols to utilize the collaboration functionality of [OpenGroupware].  Functionality can be added to [ZideStore] via "bundles".  [http://code.google.com/p/zogi/ zOGI] is such a bundle.

The [http://www.opengroupware.org/en/projects/zidestore/index.html ZideStore page] at the [http://www.opengroupware.org OpenGroupware.org project].
